snippet.title: Dyson Sphere Program - Official Free Content Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the latest trailer for Dyson Sphere Program to see the free content reveal and the next challenge! Dyson Sphere Program is a sci-fi sandbox construction game with space, adventure, exploration and factory automation elements. In the future, humanity creates a supercomputer known as the "CentreBrain" with the hope of utilizing its powerful computing capabilities to further expand the application of virtual worlds. You are a space engineer in charge of a project launched by the space alliance COSMO, tasked with a massive undertaking: constructing Dyson Spheres (a megastructure that would orbit around a star, harnessing all its power and energy) to produce the energy that CentreBrain needs.
